name: Wood Elf
description: Elves with heightened speed, keen senses, and a strong connection to nature.

Elf Weapon Training (Wood Elf).description: You have proficiency with the longsword, shortsword, shortbow, and longbow.

Fleet of Foot.description: Your base walking speed increases to 10.5m.

Mask of the Wild.description: You can attempt to hide even when you are only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.
